p: Aframomum melegueta, commonly known as grain of paradise or guinea grains, contains rich amounts of 6-paradol, 6-gingerol, 6-shogaol and other pungent compounds. The main components of ginger extract are 6-gingerol and 6-shogaol [ 84]. Other studies found that 6-paradol is also one of the main components [ 85]. These compounds have been shown to activate TRPV1 [ 86, 87, 88] and TRPA1 [ 61, 88, 89].
